meta.description: An interactive portfolio showcasing web development projects.
meta.author: malivinayak

about: Hi! I'm a first year MTech student majoring in Artificial Intelligence @IITKGP. A keen learner, I'm interested in Data Structures and Algorithms, and Web Development. Open to exploring new fields, I hope to work on projects that impact those around me in a positive way.
• Known for my self-projects and ability to process many ongoing tasks while always maintaining a calm presence and ability to prioritize well under pressure
• Experienced in Object-oriented programming, data structure and algorithm
• Quick learn and master in new technologies; successful working in both team and self-directed settings.
